Wednesday, 24 January 2018

8 hours playing sudokus

Imagine that you were paid for playing sudokus, they are all the same with only slighly variations and your career progression is simply to find different ways to play it or to do it faster.

Once Upon a Time

So, what is this?

This is a blog, created in Jekyll a simple static page creator for blogs that does not require a database. I didn’t know how to use it, never heard of it, until two hours ago.
